definition: Long live (the king, the revolution etc)!/Your Majesty/His Majesty
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
see 友誼地久天長|友谊地久天长[You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2]

sentences.english: Long live Afghanistan and the spirit of sportmanship.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗萬歲，運動精神萬歲。

sentences.english: Long live Afghanistan and the spirit of sportmanship.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗萬歲，運動精神萬歲。

sentences.english: China long live, Olympic Games refuel, Sichuan rises.
sentences.chinese: 中國萬歲，奧運加油，四川雄起。

sentences.english: It's a cool high. Long live art students.
Long live the People's Republic, Long live the great unity of people of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國萬歲，世界人民大團結萬歲。

sentences.english: Long live the People's Republic, Long live the great unity of people of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國萬歲，世界人民大團結萬歲。

sentences.english: They spake and said to the king Nebuchadnezzar, O king, live for ever.
sentences.chinese: 他們對尼布甲尼撒王說，願王萬歲。

sentences.english: You couldn't afford this thing if lived to a million.
sentences.chinese: 意爲你就是活到一萬歲也買不了這車。

sentences.english: "Viva Las Vegas" and "Jailhouse Rock, " were among the movies.
sentences.chinese: “拉斯維加斯萬歲”和“監獄搖滾”包括在電影中。

sentences.english: Then they sounded the trumpet and all the people shouted, 'Long live King Solomon!'
sentences.chinese: 人就吹角，衆民都說，願所羅門王萬歲。

sentences.english: And they blew the trumpet; and all the people said, God save king Solomon.
sentences.chinese: 人就吹角，衆民都說，願所羅門王萬歲。

sentences.english: Blow the trumpet and shout, 'Long live King Solomon! '
sentences.chinese: 人就吹角，衆民都說，願所羅門王萬歲。

sentences.english: Then said Daniel unto the king, O king, live for ever.
sentences.chinese: 但以理對王說，願王萬歲。

sentences.english: Return to banzai, the space space has been much better.
sentences.chinese: 回萬歲，格格已經好多了。

sentences.english: Long live the thought suddenly understood ah.
sentences.chinese: 突然又想到理解萬歲啊。

sentences.english: 'Long Live the Unity of the Peoples of the World'.
sentences.chinese: 右邊是“世界人民大團結萬歲”。

definition: Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
(it's) no wonder (that...)/(it's) not surprising (that)
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
suffix for nouns
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
first tone in Mandarin (high, level tone)
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man
so-called/what is called
alone/independent/single/sole/only
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
